text: José María de la Torre Martín (9 September 1952 - 14 December 2020) was a Mexican Roman Catholic bishop. De la Torres Martín was born in Mexico City. He became a priest in 1980. He was titular bishop of Panatoria and as auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Guadalajara, Mexico from 2002 to 2008 and as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Aguascalientes, Mexico, from 2008 until his death in 2020. De la Torre Martín died on 14 December 2020 from COVID-19 in Aguascalientes, Mexico at the age of 68.Diocese of Aguascalientes ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico Category:Mexican Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Mexico City Category:People from Aguascalientes
title: José María de la Torre Martín
